imdb.title: Tamayomi: The Baseball Girls
imdb.plot: Yomi Takeda was a pro pitcher of her school's team in junior high. However, she was the only ace in her club and other club's players could never catch up with Yomi, hence Yomi quits baseball, graduates from junior high and enroll...

episodes.title: A Fated Reunion
episodes.plot: Yomi has given up baseball since no one can catch her special throw. But then she reunites with her childhood friend on the very first day of high school.

episodes.title: Let's Play Ball Together
episodes.plot: An actual team begins to take shape when some 1st-years show up to play. But to get a couple upperclassmen to stay will take some special convincing.

episodes.title: Take Me With You
episodes.plot: The team gets their hopes up when some surprise sluggers join in for practice. With a lineup like this, they all start wondering how far they can actually go.

episodes.title: Pitch of Promise
episodes.plot: Despite facing a powerhouse of an opponent, the newly-formed team plays their first practice match and proves these underdogs aren't to be overlooked.

episodes.title: Losing Streak
episodes.plot: Hoping a training camp will fix some of their problems, the girls learn the hard way that there's no quick fix to becoming a winning team.

episodes.title: With Hearts Full of Hope
episodes.plot: The team tries to snag their first win in a practice game by changing up the lineup, but Tamaki doesn't want Yomi throwing her special pitch.

episodes.title: Night Sky After Rain
episodes.plot: After Rei and Yoshino bring back the results for the tournament bracket, the twins spy on their first opponent and reflect on how they came to love baseball.

episodes.title: From Zero
episodes.plot: Following an embarrassment mishap at the opening ceremony, Shin Koshigaya struggles to score against an opponent who's hoping to end the game quickly.

episodes.title: Change the Tide
episodes.plot: Yoshino is burdened by guilt when her big plan backfires and gets someone hurt. Does the team have what it takes to change the tide and stay in the tournament?

episodes.title: Show 'Em What We've Got
episodes.plot: It's finally time for Yomi to take the mound and show everybody what she's got. Can Shin Koshigaya hold their own or will they get steamrolled by a top-tier team?

episodes.title: This is Nationals Level
episodes.plot: A string of bad luck lands Yomi and the team in a tough situation. They'll have to shut down Ryoyukan's power hitters, but can Yomi and Tamaki rise to the challenge?

episodes.title: Pitch Without Regret
episodes.plot: Yomi and the team take the former champs into the final innings and find out if they can compete with the best of the best.
